RootLayout.title: Polotrip | Travel Photos and Memories
RootLayout.description: Polotrip is a platform for sharing travel photos and memories, allowing you to organize albums and share special moments.
RootLayout.keywords: photos, travel, albums, memories, photography, sharing, timeline, tourism

CookieConsent.title: We use cookies
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. For more information on how we use cookies, please see our cookie policy.
CookieConsent.by_accepting: By clicking "Accept", you agree to our use of cookies.

Hero.title: Keep memories that enchant
Hero.subtitle: Create interactive travel albums with photos and maps to share your adventures with those who really matter.

Benefits.title: Why choose Polotrip?
Benefits.description: Unlike conventional storage solutions, Polotrip is exclusively designed to create and share travel memories the way you've always wanted.

cards.organized_memories_description: No more lost photos in random folders. Keep your travel memories organized and easy to find.
cards.interactive_map_description: Visualize your journey on a map with all the places you've visited, unlike conventional storage services.
cards.music_soundtrack_description: Add a YouTube music to play while people browse through your album, creating an even more immersive and emotional experience.
cards.no_space_limitations_description: Forget 'storage full' messages from your G**gle Drive or Dr**box. Focus on memories, not managing space.
cards.narrative_experience_description: Turn your photos into stories, not just files piled up in a cloud storage folder.
cards.easy_sharing_description: Share your albums with whomever you want through a link, maintaining full control over your memories.

HowItWorks.title: How does it work?
HowItWorks.description: Creating and sharing your travel memories has never been easier. Follow these simple steps to get started.

steps.step_1_title: Register in a few seconds and start creating your first personalized digital travel album.
steps.step_2_title: After creating the album, complete the purchase quickly and securely to unlock the upload of your memories.
steps.step_3_title: Add your best travel photos to your digital album.
steps.step_4_title: Organize your photos and add locations to the interactive map to wrap up your memories.
steps.step_5_title: Send the link of your album to friends and family to relive your adventures. They can browse the map and see your photos.

Faq.title: Frequently asked questions
Faq.description: For further questions, send a message to our support contact
Faq.image_alt: Illustration of a woman holding a balloon with question marks

questions.q1_question: Do I need to create an account to use it?
questions.q1_answer: Yes, you need to create an account to start creating and managing your albums securely.
questions.q2_answer: Yes! After creating an album, you can share a secure link with friends or family, with privacy control.
questions.q3_question: Do people need an account to view my album?
questions.q3_answer: No! Just share the album link and anyone can access it, without needing to create an account.
questions.q4_question: Are my photos safe on Polotrip?
questions.q4_answer: The photos in your albums can only be viewed by those who have the album link. However, the images are stored on a public server, which means that, technically, anyone with the exact address of the image can access it. The image address is hard to guess and is not publicly disclosed by the platform. We recommend that you share the album link only with people you trust. Albums created on Polotrip remain available via link as long as the platform is active. If we need to terminate the service, we will notify you in advance so you can download a copy of your memories.
questions.q5_question: Does the album expire after a while?
questions.q5_answer: No. Once created, your album remains available for you to access and share whenever you want.
questions.q6_question: Can I edit the album after publishing it?
questions.q6_answer: Yes! You can edit the title, description, cover photo, delete photos, change captions, or adjust locations on the map at any time.

Cta.title: Ready to create your first album?
Cta.description: For as little as <price>{price}</price>, create a unique and memorable digital travel album.

SignIn.title: Welcome!
SignIn.subtitle: Choose one of the options below to authenticate your account
SignIn.webview_dialog_description: To sign in with Google, you need to open this site in an external browser (Safari, Chrome, etc.). Sign in does not work in in-app browsers.
SignIn.webview_dialog_open_manually: Copy the link above and paste it in your browser to continue.

metadata.description: Create a new album to share your travel memories on Polotrip

form.title: Create new album
form.trip_date_placeholder: Select the month and year of the trip
form.description_placeholder: Tell us a little about this trip...
form.cover_selected_instruction: If you want to change it, drag and drop again
form.order_summary_description: Includes up to {photoLimit} photos and all premium features

metadata.title: Dashboard | Polotrip
metadata.description: Manage your albums and share your travel memories on Polotrip

Dashboard.title: My albums
Dashboard.subtitle: Manage and share your travel memories

steps.step_1_description: On the Dashboard, you will find all your travel albums. Here you can view, manage, and share your memories with just a few clicks.
steps.step_2_description: To create an album, click on "New album", fill in the basic information, and make the payment. Each album is a new opportunity to organize your travel memories.
steps.step_3_description: After creating your album, you can upload your best photos. Select, drag, and drop your images to start filling your travel album.
steps.step_4_description: Before publishing, organize your photos as you wish. You can reorder, add captions, and ensure your album tells the perfect story of your trip.
steps.step_5_description: Your album is ready to be shared! Send the link to friends and family so everyone can relive the special moments of your trip.

install_pwa.title: Install the Polotrip app
install_pwa.description: For a better experience, install Polotrip as an app on your device and get quick access to your travel memories!

metadata.default_description: Check out the photos and memories of this special album on Polotrip

initial_dialog.description_2: All metadata will be treated with the same level of security as your other personal data, in compliance with LGPD (Brazil) and GDPR (Europe).

metadata.title: Platform Access | Polotrip
metadata.description: Log in or create your account on Polotrip to start sharing your travel memories.
metadata.keywords: login, signup, access, account, polotrip, albums, photos, travel

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Polotrip collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our service. By using Polotrip, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

information_we_collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
information_we_collect.content: We collect the following types of information:

items.account_info: <bold>Account information:</bold> Name, email, and profile when you register or log in via Google.
items.user_content: <bold>User content:</bold> Photos you upload, including associated metadata (EXIF) such as date, time, geographic location, width, and height when available.
items.payment_info: <bold>Payment information:</bold> Transaction data processed through Stripe (we do not directly store credit card data).
items.usage_data: <bold>Usage data:</bold> Information about how you interact with our service, including access logs and activities performed.

photo_metadata_collection.title: 3. Collection of Photo Metadata
photo_metadata_collection.content_1: When you upload photos, Polotrip collects and processes EXIF metadata to provide features like the timeline and interactive map. This includes:

items.date_time: Date and time the photo was taken

photo_metadata_collection.content_2: We will always inform you about the collection of this data during the upload process, and you will have the option to remove this metadata before completing the upload.

items.provide_services: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.process_transactions: Process transactions and manage your account
items.enable_sharing: Allow the creation and sharing of digital albums
items.organize_photos: Organize your photos into timelines and maps based on metadata
items.ensure_security: Ensure the security and integrity of our service
items.communicate: Communicate with you about updates or issues related to your account

data_storage.title: 5. Data Storage
data_storage.content_1: Your data is stored as follows:

items.album_covers: Album covers: Stored in a public bucket on Supabase
items.album_photos: Album photos: Stored in a private bucket on R2 Cloudflare
items.metadata_account_info: Metadata and account information: Stored in a secure database

data_storage.content_2: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

information_sharing.title: 6. Information Sharing
information_sharing.content_1: We share your information in the following circumstances:

items.authorized_people: <bold>With people you authorize:</bold> Your albums are visible only to people with whom you share the unique link. The images in the albums are stored in a public bucket, which technically means that anyone with the exact image address can access it. However, the image addresses are difficult to guess and are not publicly disclosed by the platform.
items.service_providers: <bold>With service providers:</bold> We share data with service providers that help us operate Polotrip, such as Stripe (payments), Supabase, and Cloudflare (storage).
items.legal_requirements: <bold>When required by law:</bold> We may disclose your information when required by law or to protect our legal rights.

information_sharing.content_2: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We recommend that you share your albums only with people you trust.

third_party_integrations.title: 7. Third-Party Integrations

items.posthog_analytics: PostHog for product analytics and web analytics

third_party_integrations.content_2: Each of these services has its own privacy policies, and we recommend that you consult them to understand how they handle your data.

cookies_and_analytics.title: 8. Cookies and Analytics
cookies_and_analytics.content_1: Polotrip uses cookies and analytics tools to improve your experience and understand how you use our service.

items.remember_preferences: Remember your language preferences and settings
items.store_consent: Store your consent for cookie and analytics usage

analytics_posthog.title: PostHog Analytics
analytics_posthog.content_1: We use PostHog, a product analytics platform, to collect information about how you interact with our service. This helps us to:

items.understand_behavior: Understand how users navigate and use our features

data_collected.user_interactions: Interactions with buttons, forms, and features
data_collected.device_info: Device type, browser, and operating system

analytics_posthog.content_3: All collected information is anonymized whenever possible and does not include sensitive personal data such as passwords or payment information.

opt_out.title: Analytics Opt-Out
opt_out.content: You can opt out of PostHog tracking at any time through the cookie banner that appears on your first visit or by changing your preferences. When you opt out, we do not collect analytics data, although some cookies essential for the service to function are still necessary.

consent_management.title: Consent Management
consent_management.content: Your consent for cookie and analytics usage is stored locally in your browser and can be changed at any time. You can review your preferences through the cookie banner or contact us for more information.

your_rights.title: 9. Your Rights
your_rights.content_1: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

items.access_data: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
items.delete_data: Request the deletion of your data
items.withdraw_consent: Withdraw your consent at any time
items.object_processing: Object to the processing of your data in certain circumstances

your_rights.content_2: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at help@polotrip.com.

data_retention.title: 10. Data Retention
data_retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide the requested services or to comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, your albums and photos will be removed from our servers within 30 days.

policy_changes.title: 11. Changes to this Policy
policy_changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through a notice on our website or by email.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at privacy@polotrip.com.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Polotrip, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access or use our services.

service_description.title: 2. Description of Service
service_description.content: Polotrip is a SaaS that allows you to create, edit, and share interactive digital travel albums, including features like a timeline, interactive map, and Spotify integration.

user_account.title: 3. User Account
user_account.content: To use Polotrip, you need to create an account using your email or social login via Google. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

payments.title: 4. Payments and Subscriptions
payments.content: Polotrip operates on a "pay-per-album" model, charging BRL 19.99 for albums with up to 100 photos. All payments are processed by Stripe and are non-refundable, except in cases provided for by Brazilian law.

user_content.title: 5. User Content
user_content.content_1: You retain all rights to the photos and other content you upload to Polotrip. By using our service, you grant Polotrip a limited license to store, process, and display your content solely to provide the service to you and the people with whom you share your albums.
user_content.content_2: You are responsible for ensuring that you have the right to share any content you upload to Polotrip and that this content does not violate third-party rights.

album_sharing.title: 6. Album Sharing
album_sharing.content: Polotrip allows you to share albums through unique links. Only people with access to the link will be able to view the album. You are responsible for managing who you share your links with and for the content of the shared albums.

prohibited_use.title: 7. Prohibited Use
prohibited_use.content: You agree not to use Polotrip to:

items.illegal_content: Upload illegal, offensive, defamatory, or third-party rights-violating content
items.violate_laws: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
items.unauthorized_access: Attempt to access other users' accounts or parts of the service to which you do not have permission
items.distribute_malware: Distribute malware or carry out attacks on the service
items.unauthorized_commercial_use: Use the service for unauthorized commercial purposes

storage_and_access.title: 8. Storage and Access to Images
storage_and_access.content: Images uploaded to the platform are stored in a public storage service, but access to the albums is restricted through unique links. By sharing an album, you agree that anyone with the link can view the images it contains. We are not responsible for unauthorized access resulting from the user sharing the link.

cancellation.title: 9. Cancellation and Termination
cancellation.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms of Use.

terms_changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
terms_changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time, notifying users of significant changes. Your continued use of the service after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

governing_law.title: 11. Governing Law
governing_law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Brazil. Any dispute related to these terms will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Brazilian courts.
